application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G.1 Oleaster x3 - (exempt).T.1 Pine - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood & crown lift to 2.5-3m from ground level.T.2 Cherry - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, remove all Ivy & deadwood.
decision_conditions: T.1 Pine - 1m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, crown lift to 2.5m from ground level & remove all ivy.T.2 Cherry - 2m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points, remove all Ivy & deadwood.
